xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 13 September 2013
xwikidoc.content: <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 03:27 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 04:11 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 07:53 <bvancea> hey guys, hangout in 3 hours? 08:03 <sdumitriu> Hey bvancea 08:03 <sdumitriu> Yes 08:05 <bvancea> thanks, just wanted to make sure. 08:05 <bvancea> how's the phenotips realease going? 08:08 <sdumitriu> Getting closer 10:46 <bvancea> go go hangout? 10:46 <bvancea> :) 10:54 <sdumitriu> Marc is late... 10:54 <bvancea> I see 10:54 <bvancea> ok 10:55 <bvancea> Marc made a lot of logos 11:05 <Jim_> has joined #medsavant 11:57 <mcupak> sdumitriu: I don't think the link can help in my situation 11:58 <mcupak> sdumitriu: it seems it would help with properties in the mapping, but those would still have to be reflected by method/field in class, which i cannot anticipate before 12:04 <sdumitriu> No, not really 12:04 <sdumitriu> Hibernate knows the property name 12:04 <sdumitriu> And the class name 12:04 <sdumitriu> You specify a custom PropertyAccessor 12:05 <sdumitriu> Which returns a Getter which just gets from a generic Map<String, Object> member of the class the value stored under the key with the same name 12:05 <sdumitriu> This just needs to add such a map to the Variant class 12:06 <sdumitriu> Ah, actually that already exists 12:06 <sdumitriu> http://docs.jboss.org/hibernate/orm/3.5/javadoc/org/hibernate/property/MapAccessor.html 12:06 <sdumitriu> Hm, not sure how exactly does it know which map to access 12:19 <mcupak> hm, I'm going to try and use it in an example, it feels like I'm missing something though 12:21 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 12:31 <sdumitriu> Ah, I looked at the code 12:31 <sdumitriu> MapAccessor doesn't work with a map member of a class 12:32 <sdumitriu> It works if the class is a Map instance 12:32 <sdumitriu> But it's easy to adapt it to work with a map member of a class 12:32 <sdumitriu> https://github.com/hibernate/hibernate-orm/blob/master/hibernate-core/src/main/java/org/hibernate/property/MapAccessor.java 12:37 <mcupak> that makes more sense 12:39 <mcupak> I'm still not sure it can be used with individual map entries mapped to columns though 13:43 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant 15:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant
